Texts.Eng: Another artifact in place. We're getting there steadily, dear. Well done!
Find the ^orange;artifact^reset; in the ^orange;Great Sovereign Temple^reset;
I have received coordinates for ^orange;The Great Sovereign Temple^reset;. ^green;Use the ship computer^reset; to access the location.

^green;The ^orange;Avian artifact^green; is in ^orange;The Great Sovereign Temple^white;; one of the largest structures devoted to Kluex that the Avians have ever built. These temples tend to be guarded, so take care inside dear.
